transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hello sir, good evening.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Haan sir free hai na sir abhi? Main kyunki aapka abhi discuss karna tha sir. Aapne jo issue dala hai na, aapko buyleads nahi aa rahe hai na sir?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, toh abhi jaise main aapko bata deta hu. Abhi aapke bhai se sir thodi der pehle baat hui thi sir, hai na?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, aapke chhote bhai jaise ki sir abhi jaise main dekh raha hu abhi jaise aap use kar rahe hai IndiaMART toh tabse ek hi baar sir baat chit bhi nahi hota sir kya aapka? Jaise aap koi buyleads consume karte hai baat bhi nahi hota jaise koi baat bhi hota ho call pe.
Customer: Baat, baat hoti hai sir toh final nahi ho paati hai.
Executive: Achha final deal nahi ho paati sir, hai na?
Customer: Haan. Matlab actually aur messages do-do, ek-ek, do-do ka bhi aa raha hai usme bhi error do aa rahi hai aur bunch mein nahi aa rahi, bunch mein jaise aata hai.
Executive: Achha samajh gaya aapko matlab bulk mein order chahiye sir, hai na bulk ke?
Customer: Haan bulk, bulk chahiye.
Executive: Haan. Aur sir main dekh raha hu abhi aapne jaise maine jab aapko welcome call ki thi uske baad sir aapne kuch isme products bhi add kiye hai apne, hai na sir?
Customer: Add toh pahle se hi hue hai but maine abhi kuch nahi kiya.
Executive: Achha aapne shayad spring plate karke aapne kuch add kiya sir, spring plate.
Customer: Haan jiska sir aapne price rakha hua hai ₹65 per kg sir usme.
Customer: Woh toh pahle se hi add kar rakha hoga sir but.
Executive: Achha haan uske neeche haan okay okay.
Executive: Haanji uske neeche sir main dekh raha hu ek aur hai Olympic.
Customer: Thoda sa Olympic light pole hoga.
Executive: Haan haan. Yes sir main inquiry bhi, haan main sir inquiry dekhu, inquiry toh aapko aayi thi ek sir inquiry aayi thi sir aapko Muradabad se sir 12 tareekh ko aayi thi. Yeh aayi thi sir apni solar panel mounting structure Sandeep ji ne daali thi. Inse baat hui thi sir aapki?
Customer: Nahi inse baat nahi hui.
Executive: Achha inse baat nahi hui.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur sir ek call bhi, call vgera aati hai sir aapko direct koi call aati hai? Woh kaise aati hai?
Customer: Koi call nahi aati, koi call nahi aati sir.
Executive: Ya koi call nahi aati. Isliye sir mere ko update karna padega aapka catalog main dekh raha hu kaafi cheeze missing hai isme. Ek toh aapka yeh CCTV pole hai sir, hai na?
Customer: Haan CCTV pole hai, lighting pole hai.
Executive: Haan. Toh ek aapka yeh main toh sir product gantry ki sir aapka jo gate hota hai sir gantry wala.
Customer: Gantry haan sir.
Executive: Achha yeh aapka gantry aapka main hai sir, hai na sir?
Customer: Haan main hai sir hamara solar structure hai, gantry hai, water tank hai. Lighting pole hai, camera pole hai.
Executive: Nahi aapke haan main kaun kaun se hai ek aapka gantry ho gaya, ek water tank wala.
Customer: Water tank.
Executive: Water tank structure, hai na sir?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Lighting pole theek hai aur?
Customer: Aur tumhara water tank, camera pole.
Executive: Camera pole?
Customer: Solar structure.
Executive: Solar structure?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan toh sir ek kaam karna padega.
Executive: Actually sir aapne jo cheeze batai hai usse ek kal aap morning mein free hai na sir video meet ke liye kyunki main ek kaam karta hu main aapke update karne padenge sab cheeze. Main dekh raha hu kaafi missing hai cheeze sir aapki catalog mein.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, call karna.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur ek kaam karna sir aap mujhe ek kaam karna main aapko hi bhejunga WhatsApp pe. Jo abhi photos hai woh mujhe send kar dena jaise ki main photo bataunga ek aapka CCTV pole hai sir, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan iski photo mujhe send kar dena aur aur ek aur hai aapka product structure fabrication hai sir, hai na?
Customer: Haan, haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan structure fabrication aur CCTV pole in dono ki mujhe photo send kar dena toh main aapki add kar dunga. Kal morning mein sir kitne baje free rahenge sir aap?
Customer: Kar lena ek baar call kar lena bata dunga.
Executive: Haan toh main aapko ek WhatsApp pe send karunga sir. Aur baaki mujhe yeh bataiye jaise ki aap baat karte hai buyers se toh buyers se sir bilkul baat nahi ho paati ki phir turant aapki call cut kar dete hai jaise koi buyer ko aap call kiya aapne ek mahine ke andar?
Customer: Haan jaise call aati hai na toh woh.
Executive: Haan haan. Koi dikkat nahi hai sir main ek kaam karunga main kal aapka update karunga catalog aapko bata bhi dunga kaise aapko matlab deal convert karni hai apni, theek hai?
Customer: Haan kyunki aap sir abhi IndiaMART pe new hai iski wajah se aapko yeh issue aa raha hai. Isliye main aap video meet pe aana toh main aapke saare jo catalog ke products hai unki category mapping aur unki price aur unki photos saari cheeze update kar dunga aur aapko bata bhi dunga kaise aapko koi buyleads consume karni hai, kis filter use karni hai jisse aapko kya hai relevancy ka issue aa raha hai woh aapka solve ho jayega, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan toh sir abhi aapne jo issue dala hai iska main close, close kar raha hu, theek hai sir? Aur kal aapki issue main aapke video meet se solve karunga, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan jo aapne issue dala usko main close, close kar du na sir jo aapne issue dala hai abhi?
Customer: Theek hai, okay.
Executive: Haan toh theek hai woh main close kar de raha hu baaki aap morning mein kal main aapka saara catalog update karunga toh aap kal free rehna. Main kareeb aapko 10 baje call kar dunga ya message kar dunga toh aapko link share karke aap ek baar video meet pe aa jana, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, okay.
Executive: Haan sir koi aur issue aa raha hai toh main aapko kal all, all call karunga, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Unable to finalize deals with buyers.

- Wants bulk orders.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet for catalog update.

- Executive will explain deal conversion process.

- Executive will close the current issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Customer to send photos of products.

- Executive to call at 10 AM for video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, update, video meet
